Elevate the injured part. Apply pressure until bleeding stops and bind the wound with a cloth or bandage. Immobilize the injured body part.
Do not move the injured area, stop any bleeding with a clean cloth and apply ice packs to reduce swelling.
Cover the burn with a cloth soaked in cold water and elevate the burned area.
Do not move the dislocated joint. Apply ice to reduce swelling. Use ibuprofen in case of unbearable pain.

Chew and swallow an aspirin, if not allergic. Loosen any tight clothing. Get into a position in which shoulders and head are supported. In case of an unresponsive patient, perform chest compressions (about 100 to 120 compressions a minute).
Remove anything remaining in the mouth and rinse it thoroughly. Turn the head to the side to prevent choking in case of vomiting. Keep the product or the medicine container nearby.
Remove any contaminated piece of clothing and rinse immediately with cool water for 15 to 20 minutes.
Get to fresh air as soon as possible. Remove any tight clothes, especially around the neck. Warm yourself up if you feel chills.
Turn off, unplug or move away the source with a dry object made of wood, plastic or cardboard and cover burned areas with a clean cloth. Do not use towels or other fabric as they stick to the skin.
Move to shade, remove tight or heavy clothing and drink cool water. Cool yourself by spraying cool water and fanning. If possible lay down and rinse your head and neck to avoid fading.

Move from cold or protect neck and head from wind. Remove any wet clothing and replace with dry, warm ones. Further rewarming should be done gradually. Get warm, sweet drinks, excluding alcoholic ones.

Do not rub the eye. Try to flush small objects with warm water. In case of a big object or object embedded in the eye, do not attempt to remove it. If blinking is painful, pull the lower eyelid and look upward when blinking.
Keep still, lay down, and do not move unless necessary. In case of bleeding, apply moderate pressure to the wound with a clean cloth. Avoid moving the neck.

patterns: WHO IS ELIGIBLE TO APPLY FOR INTERNSHIPS UNDER TULIP?
Am i eligible for this internship
what is the eligibility criteria for the internship
i want to apply for Tulip internship
responses: The internships under TULIP are open to Indian Citizens who have completed a diploma/graduate/postgraduate program. Candidates should, however, note that at the time of application they have not crossed 36 months from the date of results declaration of diploma/graduation.

It is open to courses and streams as prescribed by ULBs/Smart Cities in their requirements. Both AICTE affiliated and non-AICTE college graduates are eligible to apply. Candidates who have taken all the final semester exams of final year and are awaiting results shall proceed with their applications and join internships. However, the release of their internship certificates will be subject to production of education certificate(s)/degree to their respective ULBs/Smart Cities/Parastatal authorities.
The TULIP platform is a dedicated window to internship opportunities in Urban Local Bodies/smart cities.
The TULIP platform aggregates opportunities from across India for graduates on a single platform and allow them to apply for internships in the domain of urban governance.

patterns: Is the internship free or stipend based ?
will i earn money from this internship
responses: The stipend and its amount are under the scope and purview of the specific ULB/smart city one is applying to. Any stipend or allowance amount, if provided or not, will be mentioned in the perks and allowances section of the internship posted by the ULB/smart city.
TULIP allows for both paid and unpaid internships, though we recommend that candidates should apply for the internships considering the potential for learning as opposed to the stipend amount.

Any stipend or allowance amount, if provided or not, will be mentioned in the perks and allowances section of the internship. Internships are best looked at as learning opportunities and candidates should treat them as such.

patterns: Will I receive an Internship certificate?
How will I get internship certificate?
What are the benefits of completing internship?
responses: The internship certificate issued upon successful completion of the internship is a digitally verifiable and secure one.
The candidates upon successful completion of internship will receive an internship certificate, which will be verifiable using a QR code

patterns: What is the selection process for TULIP?
How are candidates selected for internship?
what is the selection criteria for TULIP internship
responses: After completing the application on the TULIP platform, the candidate can apply for up to 7 internship requirements at a given point of time. Once candidate is screened/shortlisted, he/she may be invited by the ULB/smart city for an interview.

After a candidate is shortlisted, he/she will have to appear for an online/offline interview.The candidates selected through the interview will be notified by the ULB/smart city and will be issued the offer letter digitally. The candidate may then choose to accept or reject the internship offer on the portal itself.

patterns: What documents are required for TULIP ?
Which documents need to be submitted for TULIP ?
How do I apply for TULIP internship ?
responses: A Govt. issued identity proof (Driving License, Election Card, etc.), proofs of academic qualifications and a letter of recommendation from academic mentors of the student are the basic requirements for an internship for TULIP.
List of documents is as follows: Govt. issued ID proof, proof of academic qualifications, a letter of recommendation from academic mentors.

patterns: Where I can find the information related to Approval Process 2020-21
what is the approval process of colleges
responses: Information related to Approval Process 2020-21 available on AICTE Website's Homepage>Quick Links>Approval Process 2020-21.
On AICTE Website's Homepage>Quick Links>Approval Process 2020-21.

patterns: How can I get New User-id and password (login credentials) for AICTE Web Portal
responses: Please click on Sign Up link on AICTE Web-portal or go to link http://portal.aicte-india.org/partnerportal_enu. User Manual for Obtaining USERNAME and PASSWORD @https:/aicte-india.org/bureaus/approval/ap_2020-21

patterns: I have forgotten password for logging in AICTE Web Portal. What is the procedure to recover this
responses: Please refer User Manual for Forgotten Password available @ https://aicte-india.org/bureaus/approval/ap_2020-2

patterns: Is User Id field mandatory for Forgot Password form
do i need to have a user id for password recovery
Is User Id field compulsory for Forgot Password form
responses: No, User Id is NOT mandatory. Only Permanent Institute Id is required for existing institute. In case of new institute (received Letter of Approval(LOA) in previous year) can enter Current Application Id.

patterns: When I try to login with Institute's Credentials, error message Invalid Username and Password is displayed. What should I do
Invalid Username and Password is displayed What should I do
responses: Recheck the login credentials. Confirm whether someone else has logged ino with the same credentials (Please note that per institute only ONE session is allowed. Hence, if someone tries  for 2nd session then again invalid user name and password message will popup). If no session is live and still getting an invalid username and password message, then the password might be incorrect. In such cases, you can Request for forgot password.

patterns: I am not able to generate report
responses: Please login to AICTE Webportal using your institute’s login credentials then click on  Approval Process icon. Follow the instructions given in User Manuals/Videos and apply  accordingly. For more information, please go through Approval Process Handbook 2020-21.

patterns: How to delete old faculty details
i want to remove old faculty details
i want to delete old faculty data
responses: Faculty record cannot be deleted. Faculty can be marked as Duplicate or Left the Institute under HOI & Faculty Details tab

patterns: Is Aadhaar/PAN details mandatory to update faculty details in AICTE Web Portal
Aadhaar/PAN necessary/required to update teacher details
is aadhar or pan mandatory for updating details
responses: Aadhar and Pan are mandatory to update faculty details.

patterns: How to transfer faculty record(individual) from one institute to another institute
how to transfer or move teacher details from one institute to another institute
i want to transfer faculty details
responses: This facility is available under HOI & Faculty tab. Before transferring any individual faculty record from one institute to other institute, the faculty should be compulsorily marked as left the institute in the previous institute.

patterns: What are the eligibility criteria for grant of PG Scholarship?
How to apply for PG Scholarship?
Are the students qualifying GATE/GPAT exam after seeking admission in the course, eligible for grant of PG Scholarship ?
Am i eligible for this scholarship?
Who are eligible to PG Scholarship
I want to apply for PG scholarship
Can i apply for pg scholarship
responses: Post Graduate Scholarship is entitled only to full time GATE/GPAT qualified students admitted to AICTE approved programs viz. Master of Engineering, Master of Technology, Master of Architecture and Master of Pharmacy courses in AICTE approved Institutions and AICTE approved University Departments. Any student who qualifies the GATE/GPAT exam after the date of admission shall not be eligible for grant of scholarship for the reasons whatsoever it may be.

intents.tag: Online Procedure of PG scholarship through DBT
patterns: What is the procedure for applying online for grant of PG Scholarship through DBT?
What is the online procedure for grant of PG Scholarship through DBT?
i want to apply for PG Scholarship through dbt
how to apply for pg scholarship through dbt
responses: Proposal for grant of PG Scholarship are called for through advertisement in leading newspapers. Students/Institutes are advised to follow the procedure and guidelines contained therein. Copy of the advertisement can be viewed by visiting AICTE portal at http:www.aicte-india.org/bulletin.php

patterns: What are the document required to be uploaded by the student for PG scholarship?
Which documents need to be submitted for pg scholarship?
which documents are required for pg scholarship
what documents do i need to upload for pg scholarship
responses: Students are required to upload to following documents: a) Scanned PDF copy of GATE/GPAT score card. b) Scanned PDF copy of the passbook c) Scanned PDF copy of the Aadhaar card. Students of J&K, Meghalaya and Assam are exempted. d) Scanned PDF copy of caste certificate. e) Scanned PDF copy of the Non-Creamy Layer (NCL) certificate in respect of only OBC candidates. Non-Creamy Layer (NCL) should not be old more than 1 year.

patterns: Can the Joint Account with family members be uploaded? (The PDF copy of the same.)
is a joint family account accepted
responses: No, Joint account is not accepted. Only Basic General Savings account/Normal account should be opened in the name of the student in any Nationalized bank. Student should open “ NO FRILL ACCOUNT

patterns: During the period of the course can a student open a fresh Bank account or change the Branch of Savings Bank account.
responses: Bank and Branch should not be changed during the period of course preferably for smooth disbursal of PG scholarship.

patterns: The data on the portal is submitted for the purpose of grant of PG Scholarship but it is not visible on the portal. What can the reasons be thereof.
I submitted details on portal but they are not visible
responses: Every data/attendance uploaded by the student/Institution is required to be submitted by pressing “Submit Application” button. Check up with your Institution whether “submit application” button has been pressed or not while submitting the data.

patterns: Whether students from non-sponsored categories/Management quota/foreign students are eligible for grant of PG Scholarship?
non sponsored categories management quota eligibility
Can a student from non sponsored, management quota or foreign student apply for PG scholarship
responses: No, Students from non-sponsored categories/Management quota/foreign students admitted with valid GATE/GPAT Score card are not eligible for grant of PG Scholarship.

patterns: Whether the PG Scholarship is admissible to the GATE/GPAT qualified student admitted in part time courses?
I am a GATE GPAT student, can i apply for part time scholarship scholarship
Are gate or gpat students eligible for part time scholarship
responses: No, PG Scholarship is admissible to the GATE/GPAT qualified students, admitted only in full time course.

intents.tag: State Government or Central Government sponsored schemes eligibility
patterns: Whether a student who is recipient of Scholarship either through State Government or Central Government sponsored schemes is eligible for grant of PG scholarship?
responses: No, the student who is in receipt of any kind of Scholarship/Stipend or salary etc. is not eligible for grant of PG Scholarship.

patterns: How to update/add the faculty details by import method?
What is the procedure of adding/updating faculty details by import method
i want to update faculty details using import method
how to use import method for updating faculty details
responses: Please follow the User Manual available @ https://aicte-india.org/bureaus/approval/ap_2020-21 for uploading faculty details by import method

patterns: I have made Online Payment but amount is not updated in portal.
Why is the amount not updated in the portal after i made my payment
Payment done but not reflected in portal
I have completed payment but it is not reflected in the portal
responses: Generally, payment receipt gets updated immediately. In case, your payment receipt is not updated then click on View Transaction Button under Payment tab. Otherwise, it will get updated in 48 to 72 working hours (2 to 3 working days). In case it is not updated even after that, please raise grievance with transaction details (Transaction Id generated while making the payment) through Online Grievance Redressal form. Link is available on Approval Process 2020-21 page.

patterns: I am not able to make payment because AICTE Website is not directing to Payment Gateway.
I am unable to continue with the payment as Payment Gateway is not opening
I am not able to make payment
I am getting error for payment gateway
responses: Please check whether your application has been submitted successfully or not. If submitted, then allow Popups for AICTE Website through Web browser URL.

patterns: Where to send the queries related to portal, payment and approval related issues for the Academic Year 2020-21?
Where can i post queries related to Academic Year 2020-21?
Where can i ask questions related to portal, payment and approval for the Academic Year 2020-21?
I want to post query regarding portal  payment and approval
responses: Raise a Grievance via grievance form available at https://www.facilities.aicteindia.org/Approval Process/apformEmail.php.

patterns: Our Institution was allotted a User ID last year as a new Institution. Some information was uploaded but the application could not be submitted at that time. Now I want to know that the same User ID can be used for approval process 2020-21.
Can i use the user-id generated for approval process of the academic year 2019-20 for the academic year 2020-21
can i use previous year login credential for this year approval process
Can login credentials of previous year be used again for approval process
responses: No, Institute need to apply afresh for getting login credentials.

patterns: We want to change details which are non-editable / read-only?
I want to change non editable, read only details
responses: You may contact the Approval Bureau or Regional Office.

patterns: By mistake, I have submitted my application. Is it possible to reopen the application once again to update the few details?
How can i update my application after submitting it?
Is it possible to re-open my application to make changes after it was submitted?
Can i make changes to an application which was submitted
I want to make changes to a submitted application
responses: If you have not created any payment record under Payment tab then you can re-open the submitted application only once by clicking on “re-open application” button available under Attachments and Submit tab.  Note: After re-open, the application should be resubmitted. Otherwise application will be treated as 'Application Not Submitted'.

patterns: I have applied for forgot password but still I did not receive password on my registered email?
Where will my password be sent after clicking on forget password?
I have forgotten my password, how can i get it back?
I forgot my password, can i recover it
responses: Institute need to submit the Affidavit-1 in the respective Regional Office. Regional Officer will flag the Affidavit Received against your request on web portal. Then password will be sent to the institute’s registered email id. Please check the Spam Folder also in your mailbox for forgot password email. In case of any issue, you may raise your grievance online by Grievance link available @ https://aicte-india.org/bureaus/approval/ap_2020-21

The undergraduate Academic Merit Scholarship at VIIT covers 15% - 50% of tuition
fees each semester. For more info, please visit:
https://www.viit.ac.in

VIIT offers a complimentary shuttle bus between the Bibwewadi campus
and Pune Metro Station (which is the nearest station to the Kondhwa Campus),
for students of the University. This free shuttle service runs from 8:00 am to 9:40 pm.

If you are living outside of Pune and would like pick up services, please say: Yes

For students who want to travel from locations outside of Pune,
VIIT offers payed transportation services from and to the following locations:

1)Kondwa and Bibwewadi
2)Abu Dhabi
3)Spain and Portugal
4)Al Ain

which of these locations are you in?

Students travelling between the Kondhwa campus and Bibwewadi as well,
can enjoy a comfortable air conditioned service with free Wi-Fi internet connection.
This bus depart twice a day on weekdays from pickup spots in each Emirate and will reach the campus
before 8:30am and 11:30am. They return to both Kondhwa and Bibwewadi from VIIT's campus at 2:30pm and 5:30pm.

If you would like to see more details, please type: info

VIIT also runs transport services from All over Pune
Knowledge Park in comfortable air conditioned buses with
free Wi-Fi internet connection. This bus depart once a day on
weekdays from pickup spots in Abu Dhabi and reach campus
before 8:30am. They return to Abu Dhabi from UOWD at 5:30pm.

If you would like to see more details, please type: info

Abh Dhabi |  1400  |  3200

patterns: what is the best major for me
I'm not sure what major to take
I'm not sure what not major in
responses:
To know which of our majors/courses we think would be suited to you, you can answer some simple questions.
To start, please type: start

Alright, please tell us your Highschool grades (A to D) for Math, Physics, Business, IT (in this order)
followed by selecting what you prefer from this list(management, technology, Programming)
Please separate your answers with a comma(,)

For example: A,D,C,C,programming

** TO RESTART PLEASE TYPE: start **

From your answers, we believe 'Engineering' under the degree program 'Engineering and Information Sciences' would be suited for you!

VIIT offers a variety of bachelor degree courses and majors.
You can learn more at: https://www.viit.ac.in
The courses we offer are:

1)Business and Management
2)Engineering and Information Sciences
3)Finance and Accounting
4)Humanities, Social Sciences and Health

What are you interested in?

A degree from the Faculty of Engineering and Information Sciences will develop your
practical skills to help you embrace innovation and to shape the world around us.
We offer a variety of programs in this field:

1)Computer science
2)Electrical Engineering
3)Mechanical Engineering
4)Civil

Which of these are you interested in?

Computer scientists design and write programs for computer applications; these
applications are significant and varied, including computer systems to control machinery,
the analysis of stock market trends, games design, visualisation of chemical reactions,
neural network design, robot navigation, and many other business and industrial applications.

If you would lik to enroll, please visit: https://admissions.uowdubai.ac.ae/openday/?utm_source=CorpWeb&utm_medium=progpage

To enrol in an undergraduate degree program you will need to meet the University's
minimum academic and English language requirements. In some cases, you are able to
apply for advanced standing, which can provide exemptions on the basis of work you have already
completed at another recognised post-secondary institution. Once enrolled, you can also sit for challenge tests to obtain exemptions from certain foundation level subjects.

If you like to know how to enroll into subjects for the current semester, please type: Yes

To enroll into your subjects as a student:

1)Go to My Sols and enter your provided login details
2)Go to Enrollment>Enrollment and variations
3)Enter the subject code (i.e. CSCI323)
4)Add the subject based on the semester

Repeat this for each subject you wish to enroll in

I am a general purpose chatbot. My capabilities are : 
 1. I can chat with you. Try asking me for jokes or riddles! 
 2. Ask me the date and time 
 3. I can google search for you. Use format google: your query 
 4. I can get the present weather for any city. Use format weather: city name 
 5. I can get you the top 10 trending news in India. Use keywords 'Latest News' 
 6. I can get you the top 10 trending songs globally. Type 'songs' 
 7. I can set a timer for you. Enter 'set a timer: minutes to timer' 
 8. I can get the present Covid stats for any country. Use 'covid 19: world' or 'covid 19: country name' 
 For suggestions to help me improve, send an email to shaunak.22010373@viit.ac.in . Thank you!!
